name: Alipay Singapore Holding Pte Limited
goal: Ant Financial is a Hangzhou, China headquartered financial services provider which offers a wide range of products and services that focus on the financial needs of small businesses and individuals.  Our mission is to provide equal access to financial services for individuals and small businesses which are under-served by other financial service providers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Payment Services, E-Money, Digital Innovation, AML, Data Protection, E-Commerce, Competition
